阹字的基本解释

阹
qū
猎人利用山谷等有利地形围猎禽兽：“阹以九疑。”
围猎野兽的圈：“以网为周阹，纵禽兽其中。”

阹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qū］
［《廣韻》去魚切，平魚，溪。］
依山谷作遮捕禽兽的栏圈。亦指用以遮捕禽兽所围的阵。

阹字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【阜字部】　阹； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1347第18
【唐韻】去魚切【集韻】【韻會】丘於切，?音祛。【說文】依山谷，爲牛馬圈也。【司馬相如·上林賦】江河爲阹。【揚雄·長楊賦序】以罔爲周阹。【註】李奇曰：阹，遮禽獸圍?也。【馬融·廣成頌】周阹環瀆。【註】因山谷遮禽獸曰阹。　又弩阹，漢宮名。【前漢·揚雄傳】近則洪厓旁皇，儲胥弩阹。　【玉篇】亦作䒧。

阹字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
阹字的起名意思

暂无。

Falcon
Basic explanation of words
Falcon
qū
Hunters use favorable terrain such as valleys to hunt animals: "Falcon with nine doubts."
Encircle the circle of hunting wild beasts: "Use the net as the circle falcon, and vertical the beast among them."
Falcon
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qū］
["Guangyun" cut fish, flat fish, stream. ]
Follow the valley as a fence for catching animals. Also refers to the formation used to cover animals.
Falcon
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【Fu Character Department】　阹; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1347 Page 18
[Tang Yun] Go to Yuqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Qiu Yuqie, the sound is removed. [Said the text] Yishan is also a cattle and horse ring. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】Jianghe is a falcon. 【Preface to Yang Xiong·Chang Yang Fu】The Zhou Hu was named Zhou Hu. [Note] Li Qi said: Falcon, cover the beasts and animals? Also. 【Ma Rong·Guangcheng Song】Zhou Hu Huandu. [Note] It is called falcon because the valley covers the animals.　Also crossbow, the name of the Han palace. [Previous Han·Yang Xiong Biography] Near the Emperor Hongya, Chu Xuhuhu.　【Jade articles】also made 䒧.
